title: Extensions
description: These extensions use the Model Context Protocol (MCP)
noExtensionsDescription: Browse or add custom extensions to get started
timeoutDescription: Maximum time to wait for extension response (in seconds)

builtin.developer: General development tools useful for software engineering.
builtin.computercontroller: General computer control tools that don't require you to be a developer or engineer.
builtin.autovisualiser: Automatically see your data with this UI generation extension.
builtin.memory: Teach AGIME your preferences as you go.
builtin.chatrecall: Search past conversations and load session summaries for contextual memory
builtin.extensionmanager: Enable extension management tools for discovering, enabling, and disabling extensions
builtin.skills: Load and use skills from .claude/skills or .goose/skills directories
builtin.todo: Enable a todo list for AGIME so it can keep track of what it is doing

blocked.title: Extension Installation Blocked

untrusted.title: Install Untrusted Extension?

trusted.title: Confirm Extension Installation
trusted.message:
Are you sure you want to install the {{name}} extension?

Command: {{command}}

modal.deleteDescription: This will permanently remove this extension and all of its settings.
modal.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes to the extension configuration. Are you sure you want to close without saving?

envVars.title: Environment Variables
envVars.description: Add key-value pairs for environment variables. Click the "+" button to add after filling both fields. For existing secret values, click the edit button to modify.
envVars.bothRequired: Both variable name and value must be entered

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: Add custom HTTP headers for the extension. Click the "+" button to add after filling both fields.
headers.bothRequired: Both header name and value must be entered
